titlestmt.author: Processed by D.C. Thompson

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

titlepage.publisher: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

did.abstract: Fred G. Farish was a mining engineer who documented his travels as a mine inspector in the western United States and Mexico in photograph albums showing mines and living conditions for miners between 1900 and 1922.

bioghist.head: Biography of Fred G. Farish
bioghist.p: Frederick G. Farish (1866-1946) was a mining engineer who traveled extensively in the western United States and in Mexico in order to inspect mines. He documented these travels with photographs, which were mounted in albums accompanied by identification. Farish began his career as a mine manager in San Miguel County, Colorado, in the 1890s. He was a construction and examining engineer between 1902 and 1911 and superintendent of the Humboldt Mine in Colorado from 1912 to 1913. Between 1915 and 1925 he managed mines in Chihuahua, Arizona, and Colorado.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains seven albums covering mine inspections in Colorado, Montana, Wyoming, Oregon, Washington, Arizona, Idaho, Nevada, and California; in British Columbia, Canada; and in Sonora, Chihuahua, Durango, Hidalgo, Guanajuato, Guerrero, Sinaloa, Oaxaca, Zacatecas, and Guadalajara, Mexico. The scenes include mine and mill sites, miners, and adjacent towns. There are also photographs of a European tour in 1907 including the Netherlands, France, Germany, and Italy; and of Yellowstone Park in 1908. A small number of family photographs are also included.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on the materials for research purposes, and the collection is open to the public.

userestrict.head: Copyright Information
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for observing all copyright, property, and libel laws as they apply.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: There are no other known archival collections created by Fred G. Farish at the date of processing.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Fred G. Farish photograph albums were donated to the American Heritage Center by Edward T. Farish in 1962 and 1965.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The collection was processed by D.C. Thompson in February 2003.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Item Description, Box Number, Fred G. Farish photograph albums, 1894-1922, Collection Number 01052, American Heritage Center, University of Wyoming.
